formalpara.title: Figure 5
formalpara.para: ben-1 is expressed in multiple neurons. A transcriptional fusion (after Boulin et al., 2006: PMID 18050449) of the ben-1 promoter to yellow fluorescent protein (YFP, from pPD136.64/L4817 in the Fire Lab vector kit 1999) reveals broad expression in sensory, motor, and likely interneurons. Scale bars = 100 μm in panels A and D and 10 μm in B, C, E, and F. Boxes in D indicate views shown in E and F. Strain to be available at the CGC.
